page.title: 04A DAY IN IMRAN KHAN'S LIFE
page.content: My Mum wakes me at{8}o'clock.I wash and brush my teeth.I have Cornflakes and Orange Juice.At{8.45}I walk to school with my brother Zaheer.I play football until the{whistle}goes.After Register we have assembly.I am a {Muslim,}and sometimes we have a story about{Eid or Diwali.}Then we go to {Maths},sometimes we play on the computer.After play,we do English and Reading.At dinner time I go home and have{chipatis and Halal meat}.In the afternoon we do projects.At 3.35 I go home,have something to eat and then I go to the{Mosque.}Sometimes I read the {Qu'ran,or learn Urdu.}After that, I have to clean all the rooms with my brother,and then at supper my Mum makes chipatis and Halal meat.My sister makes clothes on the sewing machine and Dad watches the News.I watch T.V until{10 o'clock,}then bed.
